name: Battle Of Ninja Archer
description:
Battle Of Ninja Archer is archery shooting & sword fighter game.In this game you act as ninja crossbow shooter.
your castle is attack by enemy and your Soldiers are not ready for fight.Now its your mission to kill all enemies using your arrow shooting skills.

Use Bow and arrow to clear the enemies outside the castle and also on the outer wall of the castle. Before start shooting and killing them, must make a strategy .
When you clear the land outside the castle, Enter into the castle and here comes the time of combat, a real sword fighter. Fight the army men and prove yourself a crossbow & sword fighter.

Battle Of Ninja Archer: Features

Realistic physics of bow & arrow
Feel the 3D environment
Amazing game play
HD graphics and effects
